text:
Other than the fact that it's 24/7, and publicly accessible even though the mall may be closed, it's just another 7-Eleven. Located near Taxi Stand A16, it's at the back side of the Plaza Singapura mall, near the carpark entrance. If you have the time and energy, visiting the mall's supermarket could provide you with a much better experience.

That said, there's a Singapore Pools in here if anyone needs to buy 4D / Toto / Horse Betting.
Aunty shang serve politely , and very kind person . Good customer service ! We are happy to come here and buy again !
